description: Discover luxurious jewelry and accessories with Giva! Explore our curated collection of discounts and elevate your style while saving. Embrace elegance with Giva deals and start saving today!

posts.post_content: Other Information: Please check the spelling before you confirm your order Please cancel/modify your order within an hour (We get to business immediately!) We accept only prepaid orders for personalised jewellery Your personalised jewellery will be dispatched within 2 weeks (by express shipping, paid by us!) We will replace your order at no cost if the polish fades within 180 days of purchase We will be able to return/refund your order for personalised jewellery only in case of damage during transit

posts.post_content: The Inspiration:DIVA, we wanted to give YOU something that held true meaning. Thus, we decided to dig deep and create something a bit more spiritual. The Tree of Life is an important element in spiritualism, representing growth, uniqueness and individual beauty. Just as the branches of a tree strengthen and grow upwards to the sky, we too grow stronger, striving for greater knowledge, wisdom and new experiences as we move through life. We simply wish to give YOU a companion in this amazing journey of life, this Rose Gold Rainbow Tree of Life Pendant.The Design:This Rose Gold Rainbow Tree of Life Pendant has been handcrafted with love, just for YOU! The design is truly intricate and adorable, with a sparkling tree of life surrounded by a vibrant rainbow, an ode to your varied memories and experiences.The Styling:This necklace is an ode to YOU. It promises to look good on YOU, always. Includes 16" + 2" adjustable Rose Gold Chain 925 Sterling Silver with Rose Gold plating AAA+ Quality Zircons Comes with the GIVA Jewellery kit and authenticity certificate Shipping & Returns : Free express shipping 30 day returns
posts.post_title: Rose Gold Rainbow Tree of Life Pendant with Link Chain

posts.post_content: The Inspiration: The Silver Ganesha Pendant is inspired by the master of intellect and wisdom- Lord Ganesha. The Design: The silver pendant has a Ganesha silhouette. 925 Silver Charm: 2.8 cm X 1.6 cm The necklace length is 43 cm and the adjustable chain is 4 cm Rhodium finish to prevent tarnish Comes with the GIVA Jewellery kit and authenticity certificate Styling Tip: Style this pendant with a mustard kurta.
posts.post_title: Silver Ganesha Pendant with Link Chain

posts.post_content: The Inspiration:The Silver Gada Pendant With Link Chain is inspired by the strength of Lord Hanuman. The Design:The silver pendant has a gada design charm. 925 Silver Length of necklace is 43 cm with 4 cm adjustable portion Dimensions: 3.2 cm x 0.7 cm Rhodium finish to prevent tarnish Comes with the GIVA Jewellery kit and authenticity certificate Net Qty - 1 unit Styling Tip: Wear this pendant close to your heart every day.
posts.post_title: Silver Gada Pendant With Link Chain for Him

posts.post_content:
The Inspiration: The Golden Colourful Charm Necklace is inspired by all the special moments that define our lives. 
The Design: The golden necklace has colourful charms attached to it equidistantly.

925 Silver with Gold Plating

Charm: 6 mm X 4 mm

Length: 41 cm + 3 cm Adjustable

Comes with the GIVA Jewellery kit and authenticity certificate


Styling Tip: Style this necklace with a square neck yellow top.
